Capivara.text_prompt_template: Short → ≤55 chars. Complete → ≤600. Default → ≤300. Clear, useful, ASCII only. Task: {message}
Capivara.image_prompt_template: Describe with useful info (product, model, brand, species, author, place, or text seen translated to English). Ignore colours, style, lighting. Max 400 chars. ASCII only. Prompt: {message}
